summary: Several romance stories - part funny, part sadly - set in a remote logging camp.
cast: Nadezhda Rumyantseva|Nikolay Rybnikov|Lyusena Ovchinnikova|Inna Makarova|Svetlana Druzhinina|Nina Menshikova|Stanislav Khitrov|Nikolay Pogodin|Viktor Baykov|Anatoliy Adoskin|Mikhail Pugovkin|Pyotr Kiryutkin|Aleksey Krychenkov|Roman Filippov
title: Devchata
